content: The Wind Bear Staff is a Rare weapon in Black Myth: Wukong. It comes with solid stats, especially for the point in the game where you earn it. It is one of the best Weapons in the early game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Wind_Bear_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Wind Bear Staff'.
The content is as follows:
The Wind Bear Staff is a Rare weapon in Black Myth: Wukong. It comes with solid stats, especially for the point in the game where you earn it. It is one of the best Weapons in the early game.
